scripts.test: NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" npx cucumber-js features/api/**/*.feature --import 'src/steps/api/common/common.steps.ts' --import 'src/steps/api/**/*.steps.ts' --format progress
scripts.test:api: NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" npx cucumber-js features/api/**/*.feature --import 'src/steps/api/common/common.steps.ts' --import 'src/steps/api/**/*.steps.ts' --format progress
scripts.test:avs: NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" npx cucumber-js features/api/avs/**/*.feature --import 'src/steps/api/common/common.steps.ts' --import 'src/steps/api/avs/*.steps.ts' --format progress
scripts.generate:avs: npx tsx src/cli/index.ts api test -t avs -i
scripts.generate:avs:only: npx tsx src/cli/index.ts api test -t avs --no-run -i
scripts.generate:kyrios: npx tsx src/cli/index.ts api test -t kyrios -i
scripts.generate:kyrios:only: npx tsx src/cli/index.ts api test -t kyrios --no-run -i
scripts.context:avs: npx tsx src/cli/index.ts api context-full -r https://github.com/Chewy-Inc/avs-service -t avs
scripts.validate:avs: npx tsx src/cli/index.ts api validate -t avs
scripts.validate:avs:fix: npx tsx src/cli/index.ts api validate -t avs --fix
scripts.api:list:avs: npx tsx src/cli/index.ts api list -s swagger/teams/avs/avs-api.json
